attributes.action: remove the European Union Flag, (yellow stars on a blue background). from photocard driving licences and replace it with the United Kingdom Union Flag, (Union Jack). The heading should also say "United Kingdom Driving Licence" instead of just "Driving Licence".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a British Citizen, born in England. I do not wish to have the flag of a foreign superstate, the EU or European Union, (increasingly run on similar lines to the former Soviet Union), displayed on my Driving Licence. Furthermore, any licence holder should be able to choose to have added the flag of England, Wales, Scotland or the Cross of Saint Patrick for Northern Ireland or Irish Republic citizens living in the UK if they should wish. There is room to add any of these flags in the top right hand corner of the photocard driving licence.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the European Union Flag, (yellow stars on a blue background). from photocard driving licences and replace it with the United Kingdom Union Flag, (Union Jack). The heading should also say "United Kingdom Driving Licence" instead of just "Driving Licence"."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
